data.formatted_address: 2 Osborn #120, Irvine, CA 92604, United States
data.name: Caring Family Dentistry Irvine

reviews.text: I have been visiting this office for several years now since my dentist retired. Grateful that my hygenist, Kim M is still with this office because she is just the best! It took some getting used to because I was accustomed to my dentist and I went through a lot with him and the work on my mouth. Dr. Jangaard is professional, he’s thorough, honest  and most of all my dentist entrusted his patients to him and so far I am pleased.

In my opinion, Dr. Jangaard is the best dentist in O.C.  His care for the best needs of the patient and his investment of time with each customer, which is tailored specifically to one's needs, is what I feel makes him shine from other dentists.
Dr. Jangaard is the best dentist I’ve ever met. Very kind, honest, gentle, and genuinely cares about you. I would highly recommend him to anyone.
Such an amazing dentist.  Great skills and a such a warm and inviting atmosphere.  Nolan is the best dentist in OC BY FAR.

About 10 years ago, I chipped my front tooth and had it repaired with a filling. Just last week, I bit into a bagel and the filling that made up almost half of my tooth broke off. I immediately called Dr. Jangaard’s office and he was able to fit me in and fix up my damaged tooth, making adjustments until I was happy with how it looks and feels. Now, no one who looks at me would know that half of my front tooth is fake, and I don’t have to worry￼￼￼ about covering my smile!

data.formatted_address: 5394 Walnut Ave ste j, Irvine, CA 92604, United States
data.name: Irvine Dental Center

reviews.text:
I'd like to express my dissatisfaction; I received a call on Monday confirming my 1:30 pm appointment today. Arriving around 1:20 pm, Lisa, possibly the doctor's wife, claimed I had no appointment without checking. I skipped the office Christmas party for this, but faced a last-minute cancellation. When I objected, she yelled about me owing money without evidence and even called the police during our argument, now awaiting their arrival. This is by far the worst experience I've ever had.
Numerous grievances regarding their management, attitude, and billing problems surfaced in various reviews. Surprisingly, this person, Lisa, seems to be a common thread in all the one-star reviews due to her unacceptable behavior. Sadly, I'm not the first nor will I be the last, as there have been instances where she called the police to remove a patient seeking an explanation. A truly nightmarish experience!

LOVE this place!
I was a little skeptical by the low rating, but it turned out to be a great decision coming here!
I needed a crown for a molar and my previous dentist told me that I need to get crown lengthening for it, came to this place for a second opinion, and I’m feel so lucky that I did that! They fixed everything super nicely and professionally and turned out that I didn’t need a crown lengthening! Saved me money, time and hassle!
I feel soooo lucky to find this place, huge THANK YOU to my dentist, I really recommend it to everybody else.

My family has been with this dental office for more than 10 years. The doctors are very professional, and the staff are very friendly. We did teeth planting,  teeth cleaning, and teeth crowning here all the time for more than 10 years, for my faimly of 4 (two adults and two kids). We are very satisfied with their service, and the price is very reasonable. Higly recommended!

This is a absolutely the worst dental office I have ever been to.
All the dental equipment is very old, and the management  is really disorganized. The worst part is this front desk lady is very bossy and rude. I was asked to change 3 different rooms when I visited this office for the first time , even the dental assistant was confused.
The second time experience was even more chaotic.They lost all my X-rays pictures that were taken at the first time. Such a bad experience! Please upgrade the computer system and improve your management.

Do not go here!  This office has rude incompetent staff and shady practices.  My mother got implants and they didn't do them correctly.  Now that we have moved out of state they won't talk to us to correct the damaged denture that was caused by the mistake.  While we were patients, I had to constantly monitor their charging because they were always making mistakes.  Because of the rude staff, I had to argue with them each tume to get the proper charging.  It's not worth it.  Find a more reputable dentist.

data.formatted_address: 9 Corporate Park #200, Irvine, CA 92606, United States
data.name: Serene Dental Center

reviews.text:
I recently had my first visit to Serene Dental in Irvine, and I couldn't be happier with the experience. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with warmth and professionalism. The staff, including both the dentist and hygienist, were incredibly friendly and attentive throughout my appointment.

The dentist took the time to thoroughly explain each step of the process and addressed all of my concerns with care and expertise. Their attention to detail and commitment to patient comfort was evident from start to finish.

The hygienist was gentle yet thorough during the cleaning, making sure I was comfortable the entire time. Their expertise and dedication to oral health were truly impressive.

Overall, I highly recommend Serene Dental to anyone in the Irvine area looking for top-notch dental care. Their exceptional service and friendly staff make for a truly enjoyable dental experience. I'll definitely be returning for all of my future dental needs!

Doctor Ali and the staff at Serene Dental were amazing, their kindness and expertise are exemplary . Dr Ali was thorough and explained everything so well giving me lots of confidence going forward. Every member of the team from doctors to expert nurses, dental technicians, and front desk administrators were so gracious and go the extra mile!! They made my experience so comforting. Lots of thanks to everyone ! I appreciate all that you do !!

I have always had such a positive experience at Serene ! I am very afraid of the dentist , but their staff is gentle and makes sure I am comfy. They always put my worries to ease! I confidently recommend them to friends and family all the time !

It’s very rare to find perfection. But Serene Dental is perfect. I’ve been going there for about 2 years now and will continue for many more years. Friendly and knowledgeable staff, great location, great care. So thankful for finding these angels.

I just had my tooth cut out to get ready for a dental implant.  There was absolutely no pain and after I didn't have any pain either.  I got pain medication but didnt even need a aspirin.  The Dr. was wonderful and kind and did I say gentle.  Easier than getting my teeth cleaned!

data.formatted_address: 4482 Barranca Pkwy Suite 223, Irvine, CA 92604, United States
data.name: Parkview Dental Group

reviews.text: Excellent comfortable dental services.  Staff always really friendly and helpful.  Even their table decoration reflects the season with loving care.

I visited this clinic today; it has a very pleasant, clean atmosphere, and the staff members who work at check-in are really helpful and kind, they are professional in thier career.
Dr. Jonathan Chu is a lovely dentist who practices with great professionalism and he has a beautiful heart and mind.  He extracted my teeth painlessly, demonstrating his expertise in the field. It indicates to me that he is highly competent and knowledgeable in his career. I wish I had known about this location sooner.

Excellent service by the staff. Receptionist are friendly Courteous. Dental techs did excellent service taking care of our teeth. Dr dentist identified issues and provided solutions for our teeth. We highly recommend this dental group for any once who needs dental care. Best wishes

I have been a client at ParkView Dental for years, they are absolutely fantastic. Friendly and helpful staff, super competent hygienist and fantastic doctors. Currently, Dr. Ahmadi is my doctor and she is knowledgeable, caring. My teeth has always been bad , I have never had even a suggestion to do anything that wasn’t necessary. I trust them  completely. I have been able to maintain the health of my teeth since I have been to ParkView dental. I recommend them with total confidence.

They are always very friendly and patient. The hygienists, today I had Sally, always ask about sensitivities or triggers or how they can make us comfortable.

Sally and the Dentist both took a keen interest in my Orthodontic work, inquiring about what was getting done and why. They answered some questions I had and offered advice to help me during and after my orthodontic treatment is complete, which was very helpful.

My fiancé loves them too, and she has some major sensitivities so her recommendation is way more impressive.

Go to these people and trust them with your teeth! Parkview Dental Rocks!

data.formatted_address: 4330 Barranca Pkwy #200, Irvine, CA 92604, United States
data.name: Dental Arts

reviews.text:
Dr. Calilung and Takara, at the front desk, were both friendly, knowledgeable and very eager to help me. Their customer service was excellent and I could tell they're good, honest people. That can sometimes be hard to find in the dental industry! I went in for a basic x-ray + cleaning and left with a better knowledge of my dental health.

I was told by my regular dentist to get a root canal and after today, there are now 2 other dentists who recommended I wait on it. Dr. Calilung, along with another dentist I visited, both said that my tooth is generally healthy and that a root canal would super invasive when not necessary. I appreciate the honesty and recommendation. I will absolutely be coming back for future cleanings!

I'd never seen Dr. C He came highly recommended by a patient and his family who has been seeing him for over 20 years. My tooth fell out so it was a dental emergency. I couldn't believe that I got an appointment the next day. Everyone in the clinic was professional, and all smiles. he knew exactly what to do and did it efficiently. What a pleasure!, if every small business ran as efficiently, Life would be so much easier. Thank you.
Dr Kadir

Front desk were very professional & friendly. Dr. X. Calilung was very informative about the consultation process and answered my concerns promptly. Very professional meeting and very friendly. Very welcoming dental office!
Always had a great experience with the Dental Arts everytime I visited. With very accomodating staffs like Linda and a awesome Dr. Xerxez Calilung. I recommend their dental services.
Amazing dentist. Very thorough yet efficient and on-time. Everyone at the office is incredibly kind and it seems that they are always using the most current technology in the office.

data.formatted_address: 41 Creek Rd #370, Irvine, CA 92604, United States
data.name: Elite Dental Irvine

reviews.text: Dr. Alice Yang is highly recommended Dentist by her professional advices and her talented skill and she is very considerate for patients. She is the best dentist I have ever encountered so far. She helped me install dental crown on my birthday and it was done perfectly! Plus, I always have her do my dental cleaning regularly 🥰

Dr. Yang is the best dentist in-town!!! Dr.Yang deeply cares for her patients and her first course of action is always to take preventative steps. She is very personable and takes time to listen to your concern. Never in rush - one is not a number.
She is a perfectionist and wanted to make sure my Invisalign worked as advertised - the bite, contact and appearance were meticulously taken care off.   I truly enjoy my smile now. Am truly appreciative of everything Dr. Yang and her staff have done.
Dr. Yang is amazing!! I had a very tight jaw/TMJ, she was so helpful in adjusting my jaw to relax the bone and muscle and I feel much better now. Thank you, Dr. Yang!

Dr. Yang and Celia have been super friendly and professional with my routine dental services. The clinic is quiet, tidy, and equipped with advanced equipment, including optical microscopes, for better resolution and clarity.

They helped my mom come up with a very detailed plan to treat a bunch of decayed teeth, a combination of tooth extraction, root canal treatment, and filling. Dr. Yang and Celia were very patient and spoke mandarin, which is great because my mom can’t speak English. Ultimately, they gave us a significant discount because my mom doesn’t have dental insurance. She is delighted with her experience here.

A couple of years ago, I did a Michigan Splint Therapy at Dr. Yang’s clinic to help with my teeth-grinding issue, and it went well. Dr. Yang used a super cool 3D scanner to scan my teeth instead of a dental impression, and the result was good. The splint fits perfectly and is quite sturdy that I don’t see much wear up till now.

I also want to thank Dr. Haidar for his professional job extracting my three wisdom teeth. One took a couple of tens of minutes because it was a horizontal tooth, and he had to break it apart first. For the rest, he only spent a few minutes on each, and I was good to go. The recovery went so well that no swelling occurred after the surgery (too bad I was kinda expecting the chipmunk selfie). After two weeks, I went for the follow-up visit, and we were all amazed at how well the recovery went considering I’m already in my mid-30s. This procedure is one of the best experiences I have ever had, so I want to shout out to the health professionals at Elite Dental Irvine!

I’ve gone through several dentists over the years and Dr. Yang is, by far, the best. She keeps up with modern techniques and technology and is concerned with her patient’s comfort during procedures. She is experienced and adept at what she does and is also very personable. Celia, her admin, is very knowledgeable and able to answer questions about insurance and coverage for various services. I trust both the integrity of the people and quality of their work. Highly recommended!

data.formatted_address: 1400 Reynolds Ave Suite 110, Irvine, CA 92614, United States
data.name: Dental House

reviews.text: I am blessed to have Dr. Perry and his team at Dental House OC welcome me to something so beautiful. The office is in beautiful Irvine California in the heart of Orange County. You’re welcomed with a wonderful vibe and an extremely clean environment. With televisions hanging from the ceiling to watch while you’re being worked on all the way to high tech state of the art technology that is used for precision and accuracy. I am having a brand new prosthesis made which is going to replace a not-so-good one made at another practice. I am very optimistic of the work done at Dental House OC and cannot wait for what the future brings!

Had my first dental examination here a few weeks ago , and from the moment I stepped into the office I felt welcomed and as if I was at home. Everyone was friendly and really helpful. The cleaning was fantastic.  1 hour she spent on me the best cleaning ever ! Dr Perry was great very informative and I felt as ease with him.

Laura at the front desk is the sweetest, most knowledgeable human, and her assistant, Tricia (Mrs. Perry), is wonderful as well! Dr. Perry is so kind, so competent, and presents you with a treatment plan that is comprehensive, yet easy to understand. I love that he always makes sure all of my questions are answered before I leave. He is a great dentist, and a welcome addition to the OC! Amenities at the office include a comfortable waiting area with coffee maker, a large patio outside with games to entertain the kids, and a charger for electric/hybrid vehicles that you can use during your treatment time! These guys are amazing. Seriously, check them out!

Thanks Dr. Perry and his team for their excellent job. I received new 7 crowns and I’m grateful to the doctor for his attention to details. I've had bad experiences with dental treatment at another offices in the past, which explains why I'm so picky. The doctor removed all the cavities that was left by the previous doctors and provided beautiful crowns. Dr. Perry very nice and positive person. The office modern and clean and I did not feel any anxiety.
Thank you very much for your work! You are definitely the best!

Honestly, I’ve been SO scared to reach out to dentists in OC because I heard horror stories of the scams (where they tell you you have a ton of cavities but really, you don’t have any). I finally made my choice to go with Dental House and I’m SO impressed. Dr. Perry is a friend of my boyfriend, so I already trusted him before meeting him. But he and his practice blew me away. Laura was so sweet and welcoming, paperwork was easy and to the point, x-rays with the best technology were more fun than anything. And my cleaning was painless. I didn’t get shamed for not flossing enough, just informed how it would benefit me to floss more! Dr. Perry was very informative and transparent about everything. The office is such a soothing environment. Everything was better than all my expectations!

data.formatted_address: 5394 Walnut Ave E, Irvine, CA 92604, United States
data.name: Irvine Dentistry

reviews.text: She didn't consult me before filling a white spot on my front tooth. I would not have got a filling there since it was not a cavity. The filling is sloppy and stained on my front tooth. So upsetting and there is no reversing.

I would give Dr. Lee and her staff ten stars. First impressions are everything and I have to say that my first few visits was nothing but superb. The office is friendly, professional. Dr. Lee is very kind and very informative. It is a breath of fresh air having come from a not so great experience at my last dentist. I felt well cared for and immediately felt a trust from what she was providing to me in both service and information. Her skills as a Dentist immediately have impacted me positively. Her easy going personality and skillset makes sitting in that chair with a mouth wide open a much easier experience. She not only provided excellent service but also listened with caring attitude to my concerns.  The office goes above and beyond in terms of ensuring cleanliness, patient comfort and welcoming. Its a fantastic start of hopefully lasting relationship with Dr. Lee and Irvine Dentistry. Going to the dentist and getting dental work is never fun but with Dr. Lee I totally look forward to my next visit.

Irvine Dentistry is 30 to 40 minutes drive, depends on traffic, from my house. I could have switched to another dentist closer to home but I chose not too because of the exceptional service & care I received there. Dr. Lee is gentle & thorough & professional. The office’s never overbooked & always on time with the appointments. No long wait and the patients get the full attention for the scheduled appointment time with Dr Christian Lee.
Dr. Lee was amazing for my tooth removal! She was very kind and explained things perfectly. She definitely helped with getting over my dislike of dentists!

Dr Lee, although somewhat nice, is a dentist that tries to overcharge you on everything. She will recommend you to do a deep cleaning and "touch up" cavities when it's not medically necessary. She and her office also have poor communication skills and don't give you consent all the time before proceeding with a procedure and don't give the best directions on what they are doing. My deep cleaning experience wasn't even as good as my regular dental cleaning experiences. I don't recommend buying an electric toothbrush from her office because its outdated and overpriced. Go somewhere else for quality dental care.

data.formatted_address: 5685 Alton Pkwy, Irvine, CA 92618, United States
data.name: Dentists of Irvine Dental Group

reviews.text: I’ve been going to Dentists of Irvine for a few years and have always had a great experience. Today I saw Dr. Paula, who is the newest dentist to the team and she was amazing! I usually have a ton of questions and she had no problem answering all of them. The dental assistant Robert was super gentle with my cleaning and was also very informative. The wait was not long at all. Also Leilani was super understanding when I got a flat tire this morning, she was able to reschedule me for a later appointment. Overall, I’ve always had a great experience here and makes me less anxious about coming into the dentist.

I had a great experience! This is modern clinic (ios app, auto-mated text message appointment reminders, online scheduling, etc..). The inside is very nice and spacious, but the people are really what makes this place great. When I showed up the receptionist was able to designate this place per my insurance (as I'm on HMO) very quickly. Then, I waited very briefly before Carlos took me in the back for exams. It was one of the fastest ones I've done and least uncomfortable. They have the new x-ray machine that uses 90% less radiation. Then I was able to talk to Cristal and Dr. Scott about my concerns. Mostly it's just the stains that I get in my teeth that look horrendous. Dr. Scott was able to recommend a toothpaste (Rembrandt) and Cristal also gave me some great advice! Someone showed me the estimated costs for the x-rays / cleanings (all together $0 with insurance) prior to them doing it. Now, what I was really impressed by was how great Cristal the hygienist was. Like I said, I get really bad stains but she was super skilled and thorough in getting them all out. My teeth look "brand new". She was super nice and patient, I felt bad because I could tell the job wasn't easy. This place will now be my regular dentist, see y'all in 6 months!

This dentist office is hands down the best find in Irvine. Dr.Scott is amazing and the staff is extremely friendly and knowledgeable!
I was terrified of going to the dentist for the first time on over 10 years and Dr.Scott gave me back my confidence and showed me not all dentist are created equal. I was really close to loosing half my smile and the Doc was able to help me save all my teeth!
Becuase their helpfulness and compassion I am no longer scared to go back to the dentist!!!!! Thank you guys so much, seriously my first visit here changed my life for ever in the best of all ways! Just go get a cleaning you will see how amazing this place is. I even spent my valentines  day yesterday with the doc, that’s how amazing they are! 😝

Been with Dentists of Irvine for about four years and have never had an issue. Staff is always courteous, professional, and just good. Doctor Scott takes care of me every time I visit and seems like he genuinely cares about my dental health. I used to live four hours away from this office but I would still drive down just to visit this dentist office. Thanks!!

I was in dire need of some dental work after pregnancy and postpartum. Dr. Eric Scott was understanding, casted no judgment, and helped get my teeth and gums back to a healthy state. I got a very thorough cleaning, a crown, and even got a wisdom tooth taken out (by their oral surgeon). Everything went smoothly, and I can say that I really trust this dental office. Also, the whole staff is absolutely sweet and wonderful.

data.formatted_address: 4902 Irvine Center Dr suite 101, Irvine, CA 92604, United States
data.name: Irvine Smile Dentistry

reviews.text: Highly recommend this dentistry. Very professional and love when Dr. Phung work on my mouth she explains everything in detail and makes me feel comfortable. I do tend to get nervous when I get work done which is not often but I truly feel secure and at peace that she will do a good job. Thx again!

I came in a bit nervous but left with a plan of action and a feeling of being taken care of. All my questions were answered in such a clear & friendly way and Dr. Cao made sure to be very gentle and aware of any sensitive areas. I experienced no uncomfortableness or pain and the entire staff makes the environment pleasant and welcoming. Being able to text them information was also a huge plus. I definitely recommend.

These Dentists are kind, gentle, professional and take care in what they do. For me, a trip to see any of them, doesn’t include any anxiety whatsoever.

Dwight

Dr. Cao  provided an excellent experience. After having had a previous experience that was not ideal, I was reluctant to find a new dentist that I could trust. Dr. Cao took the time to explain the details of what my treatment plan was. Great job! Love her work!

Dr. Cao is a great dentist who went above and beyond. She gave me a thorough cleaning, helped educate me on proper flossing techniques, and was very patient and listened to my concerns. She is very knowledgeable and  made me feel heard and genuinely cared for throughout the entire visit. They are also very affordable.  I highly recommend Dr.  Cao :)

data.formatted_address: 4330 Barranca Pkwy, Irvine, CA 92604, United States
data.name: Irvine Dental: Tran Quan, DMD.

reviews.text:
Dr Tran is the best dentist I have ever seen! I have been a patient of his since 2010, and during this time, I can say with complete confidence that he is highly knowledgeable and very skilled at what he does. Besides being an excellent dentist, his caring, kindness, friendliness, professionalism are second to none.

Dr Tran genuinely cares about the health of your teeth and your wellbeing. He always examines your XRays and checks your teeth thoroughly; only making  necessary recommendations based on what's best for your teeth--and not for his financial benefits.

He and his staff are very friendly, helpful and treat you like family. Dr Tran has done many procedures for my teeth and I am always happy with the results.
All of them were done with the highest level of care and perfection!!

Most recently, he installed a crown for me. The procedure was so smooth. I didn't feel any pain or discomfort. The crown looks and feels perfect, without any additional trips required for checking and adjustments. It was an amazing experience compared to what I've encountered with other dentists.

The cost is very reasonable too. As a result, although I've moved away and it takes me 4 hours round trip to go to his office, I still make an effort to see him.

It's absolutely worth the trip because I have utmost trust and confidence in Dr Tran. I am grateful that my nephew referred me to him. I am confident you will feel the same way as me when you are under his care.

Dr Tran is good doctor.  He cares for your overall health.  He said when your health is  good your teeth is healthy too.  Your teeth's health are more important to him than any others.  I were with him for 15 years until we moved.  I wish he has another office near by soon.

Dr. Tran is the absolute best dentist you could hope for.  He and his team exercise extreme care and detail to make sure that every feature of the procedures you receive are done to the highest level of competency.  He is our dentist for life!
Been going here for entire family for 15+ years and he's the best. Front office is super kind and welcoming as well.
Doctor Tran has being our family dentist for 20 years. I highly recommend him, super friendly and capable dentist. The staff is also fantastic.

data.formatted_address: 2500 Alton Pkwy #203, Irvine, CA 92606, United States
data.name: Light Breeze Dental

reviews.text: I have been to this place twice, and it has quickly become my favorite dental clinic. The staff is friendly, the atmosphere is great, and the dentist and hygienist are highly skilled. Melody, the hygienist, is one of the best I have ever had. She really took her time to scrape my teeth one by one for three rounds. I have had many hygienists in my life, and she is by far the best!

I have been a loyal client of this dental office for over a year now and I can confidently say that they provide exceptional dental care.

Dr. Zoya Sky is a true professional who takes the time to explain each step of the process and answer any questions I have. She is patient, caring and makes sure that I am comfortable throughout the appointment. I appreciate that she always makes sure I understand what she is doing and why it's necessary.

The entire staff is friendly and welcoming, which makes going to the dentist a much more pleasant experience. I highly recommend this dental office to anyone in search of high-quality dental care.

Margie is the best, she deserves a raise!
Her interpersonal skills are superb, she helped me get a late minute emergency appointment.
Dr Nicholay was amazing, concise and thorough.
Overall this office is great, they went above and beyond helping us, highly recommend!

I highly highly recommend Dr. Zoya Sky and her team to anyone and EVERYONE (whether you are in the area or not)! I was sooo nervous to get my first two cavities (which she found!) filled and it was by far the easiest dental experience I've ever had! From the numbing shots to the drilling, the whole experience was almost entirely painless! I had a grand time having them work on my teeth while listening to my own music. I've definitely had dental cleanings more uncomfortable than this, and to be honest, I wouldn't mind getting another cavity if Dr. Sky and her team will be fixing it! Dr. Zoya Sky is so knowledgable and thorough when she examines and explains your teeth, and she's careful and gentle when she works on your mouth so that you hardly feel any discomfort. On top of that, her staff are extremely friendly and make you feel comfortable throughout the entire visit.

I could not have dreamed of a better dental experience and had no idea dental offices as great as Light Breeze exist. I literally trust them with my whole mouth!! :D

Best dentist I’ve ever been to. Customer service is excellent and Dr. Sky (both husband and wife) are great at what thy do! I’m always so happy with my teeth cleanings. My teeth feel clean, fresh and pain free every single time! Thank you Light Breeze Dental!

data.formatted_address: 16100 Sand Canyon Ave #270, Irvine, CA 92618, United States
data.name: Sand Canyon Dental

reviews.text: I would recommend this dental office to family and friends. In my first visit, I was able to meet Dr. Mora and her staff. Everyone was helpful and ensured my questions were answered. I experienced the same level of attentiveness in my second visit. I was getting two fillings and I appreciated the staff getting me to relax during the injections to numb the area, as well as, checking on how I was doing during the procedure. The normal stuff like scheduling and getting reminded of appointment went well without any issues. Thank you. Keep up the great customer service!

High turnaround rate for their employees since 2019 (Front desk, hygienists and support staff), as I've gone through at least 5 hygienists there now.  At my cleaning the other day, the hygienist couldn't even communicate in English with me that I could understand, then they forgot about me for 10-15 minutes in the exam room until I had to flag down their attention.  They've gone downhill a lot in customer service in since 2020.  The dentist doctors and previous front desk are great, but sadly I'm going elsewhere after going here for 12+ years due to the poor updated support staff, high employee turnaround, and poor customer service.

Easily the smoothest experience I've had at a dentist since I came to this country 20 years ago. My first experience with them was no simple cleaning either, it was coordinating an emergency root canal (handled by a separate DDS) and subsequent crown (handled by Sand Canyon) after my tooth exploded (not literally, but it felt like it!)

Total pros, great staff, I think I've found my Forever Dentist. Thank you!

I cannot express enough gratitude for the exceptional care I received from Dr. Samonte at Sand Canyon Dental during a recent tooth emergency over the weekend. From the moment I called their office in distress, I was met with professionalism, empathy, and swift action.

Dr. Samonte's dedication to her patients' well-being truly shines through. Despite it being outside regular office hours, she promptly responded to my call and made arrangements for me to be seen urgently. This level of commitment to patient care is unparalleled and greatly appreciated, especially during a time of distress.

Upon arrival at the dental office, I was immediately put at ease by the warm and welcoming staff. Dr. Samonte conducted a thorough examination, explaining each step of the process with clarity and patience. Her expertise and professionalism instilled confidence in me, alleviating my anxiety about the situation.

Dr. Samonte's treatment approach was both efficient and effective, resolving my dental issue with precision and care. She took the time to ensure that I understood the nature of my condition and provided valuable insights on preventive measures to avoid similar emergencies in the future.

In addition to Dr. Samonte's exceptional skills, I was impressed by the modern facilities and state-of-the-art equipment at Sand Canyon Dental. The office maintains the highest standards of hygiene and safety, further enhancing the overall patient experience.

Overall, my experience at Sand Canyon Dental, particularly with Dr. Samonte, exceeded all expectations. Her dedication to providing outstanding dental care, even during off-hours, speaks volumes about her commitment to her profession and her patients' well-being. I wholeheartedly recommend Sand Canyon Dental to anyone seeking top-notch dental care in a welcoming and compassionate environment.

Thank you, Dr. Samonte, and the entire team at Sand Canyon Dental, for your outstanding service and for going above and beyond to address my dental emergency with such care and professionalism.

Sand Canyon Dental is the absolute best dentist around. I’ve gone here for over 12 years, I recently moved to Santa Monica but I still drive down to go here. The staff is amazing and they remember each patient. They are so flexible with scheduling and they always try their best to accommodate your schedule. I can’t recommend this place enough! They are the best!

data.formatted_address: 113 Waterworks Way #220, Irvine, CA 92618, United States
data.name: Total Care Implant Dentistry

reviews.text:
On the 1st visit right after the ex-ray,  Zahra Ezzy recommended a root canal or crown for a perfect tooth with some fillings.
This practice is not honest and will drag the patients for more money at the cost of their pain.

Dr James Kim did an excellent job on my dental implant that included a bone graft as well. The whole process took almost a year over multiple appointments. He is a very skilled and experienced dentist with a gentle touch. He explains what he is doing well and shows great care and compassion towards his patient.

I trust him fully to take good care of my dental health !

The quality of work use to be great but the practice was sold and they brought their own Drs. The work is mediocre for the prices they charge. It use to be worth it to me, not anymore. The front desk, manager, and dental assistants are still awesome but that is not enough to keep coming back. The Dr's have to be just as great. Sad to have to find a new place. If anyone knows where Dr. Del Campo went, please comment!

Dr. James Kim did outstanding care of my dental implant recently! He also very personable of care who care about my dental care! After my dental implant, I didn’t have any pain at all!!
I am very satisfied with his care and recommend highly to anyone!!

Thank you, Dr. Ezzy  for your attentiveness and attention to all my dental problems, and thank you, Dr. Kim, for your professional and comfortable surgery, and also thank you for your valuable consultant, Ms. Hogai

data.formatted_address: 9070 Irvine Center Dr STE 130, Irvine, CA 92618, United States
data.name: Irvine Spectrum Dental

reviews.text:
Dr. Anthony Yu is excellent! Best dentist ever. I was very pleased with my experience--excellent and thorough dental cleaning. Very clear explanation of my treatment plan, not rushed. He is a very ethical and knowledgeable dentist who really cares about his patients.
Comfortable and clean environment, excellent staff. Easy parking and convenient location. Easy to make an appointment. Will return again. Very happy with the care here.
The best teeth cleaning I've ever had.  And great consultation.  Very trustable.  The office is bright and clean.  Staffs are professional and friendly.  So glad I found it!

It was my first time at Irvine Spectrum Dental, and Dr. Yu was amazing! He and his team were quick to find the key issues and came up with a comprehensive plan on how to resolve them in a safe and timely manner. The best part of the experience was that I was in and out of the office in an hour after a deep cleaning session and filling up two cavities. You can tell he was looking out for your best interest instead of recommending unnecessary procedures. I highly recommend Irvine Spectrum Dental for those who are apprehensive about their dental wellness and looking for a more approachable way to care for their teeth.
The dental clinic basically offered us a good service. Our concerns and dental problems were well taken care of. We would thank Doc Yu and his staff for their diligent work today!

Dr Anthony is very patient and assuring. I came across his clinic on my insurance provider list. After reading a few of the Google reviews about him, I decided to see him. I’m glad I did. He always let me know what’s happening and is very patient with all our questions. The staff at his clinic were also friendly and professional. The clinic is clean and well maintained.

data.formatted_address: 2 Osborn #150, Irvine, CA 92604, United States
data.name: OC Lakes Dental

reviews.text: Dr. Takigawa embodies warmth and approachability, reflected in both his friendly demeanor and his personable staff. His exceptional work consistently exceeds expectations, leaving me feeling at ease and well cared for. I started coming to Dr Takigawa 4 years ago, and so happy I found him. His services has been nothing short of exceptional, being the best dental care experiences I’ve ever had over the past 50 years.

I just moved to Irvine and need a good dentist.

I searched on Yelp and found OC Lakes Dental among others.  The reason why i choose this Dental clinic is that they have excellent reviews on yelp. Also, Dr Takigawa has a compassion for the less fortunate as he participated in the mobile dental clinic in the Philippines.

So i booked my first appointment with them and i had a great experience from the receptionist, hygienist (Catherine) to Dr Takigawa.  Dr Takigawa even gave me extra time by polishing my front teeth to make It even and less prone to stains.

Overall, I am a happy patient and i would highly recommend OC Lakes Dental.
.

Been going to Dr. Aaron Takigawa for over a year now. Friendly, kind, understanding, caring and never pushes anything that isn't necessary. The dental hygienists have always been friendly and the receptionist staff is super kind. Highly, highly recommended.

I've been seeing Dr. Takigawa for about two years.  He is so thorough with his teeth cleanings.  I ended up needing a crown as well, and I couldn't be happier with how well it turned out.  I would recommend him to any family members and friends of mine!

I am so grateful to have found a dentist that I can trust. Dr. Takigawa is friendly, gentle, and most importantly he took care of an issue that I had been putting off longer than I should have because I am beyond terrified of the dentist. One visit resolved the aforementioned issue and we are now working together to get my dental health back on track. I am writing this review after my second visit and I appreciate that he doesn’t pressure me into doing any unnecessary procedures. I was also pleasantly surprised that he performs the teeth cleanings himself - very meticulously might I add. Melinda at the front desk is also wonderful which makes the appointment process smooth. I usually don’t write glowing reviews unless I strongly feel that it’s well deserved and I can be honest :) I hope it can help other folks who are scared of the dentist! Dr. Takigawa is a good one!!

data.formatted_address: 39 Creek Rd Building B, Suite 220, Irvine, CA 92604, United States
data.name: Premium Dental - Irvine

reviews.text: Thanks to Dr Naz, Premium Dental is a gem among dental offices. From the moment I walked in, I felt at ease. The staff is not only skilled but also compassionate, taking the time to address all concerns. The clinic itself is modern and spotless, equipped with top-notch technology. What sets them apart is their dedication to excellence and patient comfort. I highly recommend Premium Dental for anyone seeking exceptional dental care.

Premium Dental is great, I’ve had a couple of treatments done here and recently had to visit to do a filling. Dr.Naz is always amazing and she cares so much for her patients! Barely felt any discomfort and she was able to do my filling fast and easy without any pain! She is extremely knowledgeable and thorough. Highly recommend for anyone seeking quality dental care.

Dr. Naz is a consummate professional, she is very focused on providing the best care for her patients and it comes through her demeanor and exceptional skills. I am so happy to have finally found such a wonderful dentist who, as an added plus, has such a clean, modern office. I feel grateful to have found her here at Premium Dental!

This dental office and dentist are absolutely fantastic! They squeezed me in for an emergency visit, and Dr. Naz provided excellent treatment. She's incredibly thorough and clearly an expert in her field. I'm thrilled to have found such an outstanding office!

Dr Naz is patient, meticulous and extremely caring when it comes to her work and her patients. I feel completely at ease under her care and trust her process since she is very transparent and detailed about what needs to be done. Will certainly be returning to Premium Dental in the future!

data.formatted_address: 22 Odyssey Ste 220, Irvine, CA 92618, United States
data.name: Great Park Dental

reviews.text: You never want to make a review like this but I'm extremely upset with what has happened. My wife has never had any issues with her teeth and then was scammed into a mouthful of work before I could even suggest her to get a second opinion! You can't ever get this type of work undone and now she has pain every day when she has never had a single issue before.

My Great Park Dental experience was not only professional, but an extremely comfortable and lovely experience. Vasu made sure to go over every detail of my procedure (wisdom teeth extraction), including the post operation care, and listening to any questions or concerns I had. Dr. Lu was so sweet and made sure I was comfortable and not experiencing any abnormal pain. Definitely recommend this place for everyone as they have such an amazing variety of dental services. I will be coming here from now on!
Dr. Lu was very knowledgeable and the staff was very friendly. Overall the service was great and the office was state of the art. Would definitely recommend this dental office.
I have been a patient of Dr. Lu's  for the past 4 years, she always takes the time to go over exactly what she is going to do. I cannot recommend her and her staff highly enough.

data.formatted_address: 14150 Culver Dr #300, Irvine, CA 92604, United States
data.name: Heritage Family Dental - Irvine

reviews.text:
Dr Clibon is a real nice guy.
I went in there worrying I had a gum infection and I would have to get antibiotics (which I didn’t want) or spend $$$ that I don’t have on localized antibiotics that dentists generally gauge you on. But to my surprise he told me that the previous treatment had not yet healed completely and told me to use gentle mouthwash and see him in a few weeks.
What a relief!

Always Excellent! I have always have a very positive,caring visit. Dr.Clibon and his team are great about addressing my concerns and I feel confident in the care I receive. A Great group of people! Thanks Everyone!
Everything was fine.  On time appointment, teeth cleaning went well.  Hygienist did a good job...

My family and I have been patients of Dr. Clibon and Dr. Herring for about a year and have had all positive experiences with them.  I have found that everyone at Heritage Family Dental is professional and friendly.  My kids look forward to their appointments because they are made to feel at ease before any procedure.
Excellent service . Thorough examination and then took time to examine  the mouth and to explain  about the findings in a sincere and friendly manner .

data.formatted_address: 4980 Barranca Pkwy #160, Irvine, CA 92604, United States
data.name: Woodbridge Dental Services

reviews.text: Dr. Lomboy and his staff were all very nice on my first visit. The office feels very clean and equipped with high-tech dental equipment. Dr. Lomboy showed to be an expert in his field, highly skilled and very knowledgeable. I can highly recommend their services.
I had 2 crowns today, as well as a root canal & crown about a month ago.  Dr Lomboy is the most gentle with the best tools and techniques.  Highly, highly recommend
I’ve known and used Dr. Lomboy and his staff since the mid 90’s. They are the best!! Always there if you need them. You can’t do any better than Woodbridge Dental!!
Dr Lomboy is a thorough  dentist, up to date on new techniques.  He and his staff explain what's going on and offer advice for proper tooth care going forward.  I highly recommend!

Great experience! Dr. Lomboy , MJ and Leilani are stellar. I have had a few crowns and regular cleanings. Dr. Lomboy is gentle and always makes me feel at ease especially with the Novacaine injections
